attributes.action: apologise to the British public for the insulting and belittling response to the 'Make Clarkson PM' petition
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The YouTube video response the government made to the make Jeremy Clarkson PM simply isn't good enough.

Our money is used to pay people within the government to sit around making videos that provide no real answer to what we were petitioning for.

This, of course, comes at a time when familie might be struggling due to rising fuel and food costs.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
